settings.column_richtext:
All orders from MobileRepeater.co.uk are normally posted within 1-3 business days.
Your order will be dispatched from our warehouse and you will be forwarded tracking information for your order.

Delivery - UK:      3-5 UK 3-5 Days - Free of charge

Anywhere Else:    4-7 Business Days - £29.95

If you have any questions on your order status you can also contact us at sales@mobilerepeater.co.uk

settings.message: The tri-band has got my EE LTE working great now. I sometimes forget to connect to the WiFi since it's so quick. Haven't had reception like this since I lived closer to the city
settings.name: Rory H.

settings.message: I have tested the unit and it works great - totally exceeded my expectations.
settings.name: Peter C.

settings.message:
Signal booster has been a great success.

Location high in loft space, provides coverage for whole house, even some of garden and garage.

It has greatly improved my business/ home “life”, as I am now assured of reception.

This means I can reliably take biz calls at home, so can avoid manic Rush Hour traffic, by going to office later in morning and leaving earlier, avoid congestion and delays.

As a selling point, I would have bought a booster much earlier, if I had known how much it would de-stress, from worrying about missing important calls.

Brgds
Many Thanks
settings.name: Iain Steven

settings.message: "Thanks. The units were received safely this morning and the first one is set up and working like a charm"
settings.name: Graham Milne

settings.message: Just wanted to say we get 4 or 5 bars all the time now. Its amazing how much more I enjoy my iPhone now that I get reliable service on it!
settings.name: Selena

settings.message: People are actually excited when they come out to the farm and they get better signal then they do in some areas of town. I couldn't go back now thanks again.
settings.name: Ralph L.

settings.message: I have to say am impressed at how well the units work. I used two of the yagi antennas in 45 deg polarization for the cellular router and it is giving me downloads of over 40mb/s ... before that got almost zero signal. Also am able to calls where there was no signal before. Thanks again.
settings.name: Majd
